#summary This page will guide you through setting fife and fife-tutorials.

= Introduction =
The instructions below will guide you through downloading and setting up the fife
engine as well as the fife-tutorials.

----
= Windows Install =
  # Using subversion (either through a client such as TortoiseSVN or command line) checkout the [http://fife.svn.cvsdude.com/engine/branches/active/engine_maploader fife source code]
  # Download the [http://code.google.com/p/fife-tutorials/downloads/list Precompiled Dependencies] and unzip it in the _`<path-to-fife`>/build/win32_ directory
  # Checkout the [https://fife-tutorials.googlecode.com/svn/trunk fife-tutorials] in the _`<path-to-fife`>/clients_ directory

----
= Linux Install =
 # Using subversion (either through a client such as TortoiseSVN or command line) checkout the [http://fife.svn.cvsdude.com/engine/branches/active/engine_maploader fife source code]
 # Make sure you have the [http://wiki.fifengine.de/Build_dependencies required dependencies] installed before trying to build
 # See the fife [http://wiki.fifengine.de/Building:Linux:SCons linux guide] for installing and building fife for Linux
